title: Bug 12650Contributing action sets from plugin fragments
description: Build: 20020328I attempted to contribute an action set to the UI plugin.The class for theaction delegate was found, but the icons were not.I believe this is due to thefact that WorkbenchImages.getImageDescriptorFromExtension(...) does not searchplugin fragments for icons.This means that translators cannot provide translated icons.It also means thatproduct developers cannot override the default icons with icons of their own.
